did.unittitle: Agreement: Missouri Pacific Railroad and UTU
Agreement: Missouri Pacific Railroad and UTU

scopecontent.p: Not identified. Most likely it is of Mr. Johnson
Missouri Pacific Railroad and United Transportation Union envelopes

did.unittitle: Delaware and Hudson Canal Company Caboose no.10 Plans and Specifications

scopecontent.p: Two sets: one from Model Railroader Magazine and one from Railroad Model Craftsman Magazine. Both October 1965. This is the caboose where the Brotherhood of Railroad Trainmen was started in Oneonta, NY, September 1883.
